# PDSR {.unnumbered}

<img src="assets/pdsr_cover.webp" alt="ProgDatSciR" class="cover shdw"/>

<div class="description">
**Programming for Data Science in R** is an introductory- to intermediate-level online programming learning resource for R.  
It is frequently updated and serves as the online reference for  
UCSF DATASCI [213](https://epibiostat.ucsf.edu/programming-health-data-science-r-datasci-213) & 
[214](https://epibiostat.ucsf.edu/programming-health-data-science-r-ii-datasci-214).
</div>
